select1.label: Academic Policy for institution is available with regards to student attendance in theory and practical, dress code, professional conduct and disciplinary actions of students in clinic and classroom, a policy for students to file grievances regarding results exists
The start and end dates of the academic year included along with the exams and holidays

group.label: Teaching plan is available with the faculty

select1.label: Teaching plan is developed and distributed the units in the course syllabus to the faculties
Faculty has developed a lesson plan
Master rotation plan (MRP)/Academic Roaster is displayed - theory, clinical posting, exams, and vacations are mentioned according to the syllabus prescribed

group.label: Attend any of the ongoing classes and observe if faculty uses effective facilitation skills in the classroom

select1.label: Specify which unit/topic is being taught
Faculty uses lesson plan
Faculty discussed learning objectives with students
AV aids like projector/overhead projector, white and black board are being used for classroom facilitation

group.label: Attend any ongoing skill demonstration classes and observe if skills demonstrations are conducted efficiently in the learning lab (To be filled in by assessor basis OSCE-faculty )

select1.label: Teachers utilized the learning labs regularly for skills demonstration
Procedure checklist is available with students and faculty for demonstration
Opportunities are given to the students for practice of the skills demonstrated
Return demonstration/skill evaluations from students are taken for each skill demonstrated
CRP/Clinical Duty Roaster for each class of students exists
Developed clinical objective and shared with clinical site staff
Student distribution
Area of posting as per curriculum
Faculty responsible for each block
Procedure checklist is available with faculty
Procedure checklist is available with students
Faculty record activities conducted during clinical supervision on a daily basis
Pre-post clinical discussions are conducted on daily basis
Students daily activities are monitored and recorded
Periodic clinical evaluations are conducted
Minimum two internal exams are conducted in a year for each batch
Document/notice shows that students are informed at least 1 week before internal exams
Question paper has composition of MCQ, Short questions and long questions
Exams are structured so that they can be scored blindly (student names are not mentioned)
Structured practical examinations are held for each student at the end of each term that includes skill related objectives
Checklists or other tools are used to document observations of students in structured practical examinations
Sessional marks register/record is maintained
A document exists to track students from the entrance to exit
Faculty meetings are conducted and minutes are recorded in registers/file in the last 1 month
Regular meetings of faculty and clinical site staff are conducted and minutes are recorded (minimum thrice a year)
A record of Seminars/Webinar/Continue Education meeting minutes (last 6 months) for the teachers
